title: bittraffic
author: bittraffic
content: https://youtube.com/watch?v=WjkOBd37DkUElon must have been laughing secretly with what he did to twitter after offering them a large sum and then declining to buy, it made twitter mad that they are filing lawsuit. This lawsuit will be damaging to twitter in the end because they will have to publicly disclose information in the court.Will they settle for a lower price instead or will twitter open to disclose data which Elon's lawyers will ask?

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Elon is always several steps ahead of everybody is. He plays chess, 4D chess. Don’t worry about Elon Musk, I have no doubts that he will come out on top in this debacle.

comments.author: JohnKlein94
comments.created_time: July 14, 2022, 06:22:20 PMLast edit: December 03, 2022, 10:53:39 PM by JohnKlein94
comments.body: Quote from: DeathAngel on July 14, 2022, 05:19:29 PMElon is always several steps ahead of everybody is. He plays chess, 4D chess. Don’t worry about Elon Musk, I have no doubts that he will come out on top in this debacle. More games on the Vulkan Vegas website https://5vulkanvegas.com/ro. It has now taken 1 step back, but I think only to take 2 steps forward. Judging by Twitter's politics, it doesn't look like a grandmaster at this game.

comments.author: chexychukra
comments.body: Elon is just an evil genius  i laughed a lot when Twitter went down today due to all this situation
